name: Design4performance-a11y
tagline: Prioritize Performance & Accessibility from the Start
body:
### Prioritize Performance & Accessibility from the Start
When do you think about performance and accessibility? 

If you're like most teams, you likely look at optimizing performance and adding accommodations for accessibility in the development phase.  

This talk describes a design process prioritizing performance and accessibility from the beginning.

* "design in the browser" methodology
* QA for accessibility and performance throughout

Marcy Sutton wrote about how sites with performance issues are often nightmares for accessibility in her post, [Accessibility and Performance](https://marcysutton.com/accessibility-and-performance/).
